CustomField.description: This formula tries to strip a website of any data that distracts from its' domain name. It does not account for sub domains but does for folders that exist within the domain. It is then triggered by a workflow rule that updates a text field to better find duplicate records --Do Not Delete ---
CustomField.formula:
left(SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Website, "https:", ""), "http:","") ,"//",""),"www.","") ,"www1.","") , if(
FIND("/", SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Website, "https:", ""), "http:","") ,"//",""),"www.","") ,"www1.","") ) >0 , FIND("/", SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Website, "https:", ""), "http:","") ,"//",""),"www.","") ,"www1.","") ) -1, len(SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(Website, "https:", ""), "http:","") ,"//",""),"www.","") ,"www1.",""))))
CustomField.label: Domain
